      public FlatResourceItemWriterBuilder<T> shouldDeleteIfEmpty(boolean shouldDelete)

      shouldDelete - defaults to false

    • shouldDeleteIfExists

      public FlatResourceItemWriterBuilder<T> shouldDeleteIfExists(boolean shouldDelete)
      If set to true, upon the start of the step, if the resource already exists, it will be deleted and recreated.
      Parameters:
      shouldDelete - defaults to true
      Returns:
      The current instance of the builder

    • delimited

      public FlatResourceItemWriterBuilder.DelimitedBuilder<T> delimited()
      Returns an instance of a FlatResourceItemWriterBuilder.DelimitedBuilder for building a DelimitedLineAggregator. The DelimitedLineAggregator configured by this builder will only be used if one is not explicitly configured via lineAggregator
      Returns:
      a FlatResourceItemWriterBuilder.DelimitedBuilder

    • formatted

      public FlatResourceItemWriterBuilder.FormattedBuilder<T> formatted()
      Returns an instance of a FlatResourceItemWriterBuilder.FormattedBuilder for building a FormatterLineAggregator. The FormatterLineAggregator configured by this builder will only be used if one is not explicitly configured via lineAggregator
      Returns:
      a FlatResourceItemWriterBuilder.FormattedBuilder
